Exception Summary
ExternalizationException  
 

Error Summary
CommitError An instance of CommitError is thrown whenever it occurs a situation that prevents a transaction from committing.
WriteOnReadError An instance of WriteOnReadError is thrown whenever a write attempt is made within a read-only transaction.
